nodes.text: We should not impose gun control
are we going to make it illegal for everything we can think of that might kill.
We can create all the legal issues laws and strict gun control we want. But if someone wants to kill they could kill someone with a pen pencil knife baseball bat or even a sling shot
If gun control alone does not ensure that people are not able to kill and the additional steps needed in order to do so are not going to be taken we should not impose gun control.
